Housing: Mom reported that she would like to visit the weekend of 4/14 and would like to stay at the RMH.  SW contacted the RMH on mom's behalf and added mom to waitlist.
Transportation: Mom reported that she is no longer able to drive due to her MS and that her husband does not drive.  SW and mom discussed possible transportation options in her network of friends and family.  Mom reported that she will ask friends and family for transportation to Philadelphia.  SW reported that she will look into additional resources should transportation not be available through friends and family.
